remarks: The meet of two lattice planes is a lattice line iff their join is a lattice volume.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jul-2012.)
statement:
2lplnmj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2lplnmj.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2lplnmj.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2lplnmj.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
2lplnmj.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
2lplnmj $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. P /\ Y e. P ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) e. N <-> ( X .\/ Y ) e. V ) ) $.
